channel.title: How can I make a model?
channel.description: Like, what programs to use, and how to make it. Let's say I want to make a 'cereal box' you can pick up, and how could I make that cereal box, and make it so I can use it in Hammer?

item.title: How can I make a model?
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
xalener:

If you can’t make up something yourself, than you stop being a modeler, and become a 3d scanner.

Tell that to the tens of thousands of MODELERS in the game and film industry who are paid salaries to model characters and set pieces that they didn’t make up themselves. Or better yet, tell the Black Mesa art team they are all just “3d scanners” because they are remaking HL1 assets.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a model?

item.title: How can I make a model?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
mattemuse:

I disagree that you need to be able to draw in order to model. If you’re modeling from existing reference (for example, cars, architecture, famous actors) its more or less irrelevant whether or not you can draw.

Well, it’s the same part of your brain. Anyone can model, but the dealbreaker is being able to…MODEL…

If you can’t make up something yourself, than you stop being a modeler, and become a 3d scanner.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a model?

item.title: How can I make a model?
item.dc:creator: blue
item.description:
mattemuse:

I disagree that you need to be able to draw in order to model. If you’re modeling from existing reference (for example, cars, architecture, famous actors) its more or less irrelevant whether or not you can draw.

if you cant recognize shapes, reference will do shit for you, i know this form experience

item.title: How can I make a model?
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
I think modeling is easier than drawing, because you edit a “solid” object and you can rotate it and it has a depth.

item.title: How can I make a model?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Dias:

If it werent for us right-brainers you wouldn’t be using the internet right now, because it wouldn’t exist.

Took a left brainer’s mentality to start it. A Right brainer would’ve been all

“O NOES!!! IT’Z IMPOSSIBBLEZZ!!! WAT’S DA POINT OF DA INTERNETZZ ANYWAYZ??? WHY MUZT WEE WERE DEEZ RA-DICK-YOO-LUST-EYES!!!”

…

…

…lol.

Yeah… The internet is made of tubes… Shaped to form huge trucks you can dump stuff in.

Read full topic
